At Tonight, NBC owned the show, and we were participants. And ownership makes all the difference for Conan O'Brien and his team. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
